nodes.text: The Unstoppable Horde was a vicious Gamorrean gang operating during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY they were present on Hoth and overran an outpost of Ortolan settlers. A survivor, Leebo Nobim, retreated to a Galactic Republic military base, where he tried to warn the soldiers of incoming menace, but was ignored. He then asked a Republic citizen to steal the combat stimulants that made the Gamorreans unstoppable in combat.
